Package de.lessvoid.nifty.render.batch.spi

Interface GL

All Known Subinterfaces:
CoreGL
public interface GL
OpenGL compatibility (non-core-profile) abstraction to make it easy for internal OpenGL-based rendering classes to make direct OpenGL calls, rather than forcing external rendering implementations to reinvent the wheel. For an example of how this abstraction may be useful, see BatchRenderBackendInternal. This interface is not intended (at this time) to provide a complete OpenGL abstraction, but only access to the methods (and constants) currently in use by internal OpenGL-based rendering classes.
